column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////For a romantic dinner
column2: you really can't do better.  It's super sexy and dark
column3: and the booths downstairs are perfect for hanging and looking good.  Food is very good.  The top rec is the tomato and bacon salad - it's disturbingly good.  The steak is all great; fried chicken a little meh. Perfect drinks
column4: good service from guys who are dressed in 1890's outfit with beards (you know what I mean).  You can sit for a long time - they don't care.  The bar upstairs is a great second course - really fun and same sort of spirit
column5: but rowdy sexy mildly ambient music
column6: dim as hell.  To me it's the perfect place to go and feel fine and lux.
